Form Effects

On input focus, Form effect utility shifts label up.

<div class="bg-color-blue-light px-20 py-20">
  <div class="signup-form__input signup-form__input--long"><label
      class="signup-form__label" for="mce-EMAIL"><span
        class="signup-form__label-content" data-content="Email"
        title="Email">Email</span></label><input
      class="email form-field signup-form__field" id="mce-EMAIL" name="EMAIL"
      required="" type="email" value="" /></div>
</div>
